mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM tb_project_supervision t WHERE t.`pro_id` =#{proId};

SELECT t1.`com_name` AS comName ,t1.`org_code` AS orgCode ,(SELECT t3.display_name FROM mishu.`area` t3 WHERE t3.path = SUBSTRING_INDEX(t2.`path`,',',1)) AS province ,'监理单位' AS companyType FROM tb_project_supervision t LEFT JOIN tb_company t1 ON t.`com_id` = t1.`com_id` LEFT JOIN mishu.`area` t2 ON t1.`regis_address` = t2.`name` WHERE t.`pro_id`= #{proId} GROUP BY t1.`com_id`
select t.pro_id from tb_project_supervision t where t.`com_id` = #{comId} GROUP BY t.`pro_id`

SELECT t.`acreage` AS acreage ,t.`pro_scope` AS proScope ,t1.`bid_remark` AS bidRemark ,t1.`super_org` AS bOrg ,t3.`org_code` AS orgCode FROM tb_project t LEFT JOIN `tb_project_supervision` t1 ON t.`pro_id` = t1.`pro_id` LEFT JOIN tb_company t3 ON t1.`com_id` = t3.`com_id` WHERE t.`pro_id` = #{proId} AND t1.`super_org` = #{company} AND t1.`pkid` = #{pkid}
